name: The Office (itch) (hyperhippygamer)
description:
!!! ADULT CONTENT WARNING !!!

This game is not meant to be taken seriously. I'm sorry if we offend anyone with it. The point of this game is to give you a laugh and have some fun.

You come back after a smoke break and see everyone in the office have become semen demon, now you have to traverse and go down the procedurally generated maze building to freedom. 

KNOW BUG:

If you skip through the dialogue too fast the game kinda stop working. We're still trying to fix it, sorry.
